title: (x) straight sided "schools.org" - Method {Anastas}
content:
Identifont didn’t find it ... What the font didn’t find it ... My books don’t have it ... Easy one for someone ...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/typophile.com/files/font_7.jpg) | 6.56 KB |

 [‹ (x) Real Madrid website banner - Helvetica {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/typophile.com/node/14467 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) DJ Tareq - Nihilist Philosophy {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/typophile.com/node/14485 "Go to next forum topic")
author: amiart

comments.content:
And we don’t know what the hell are you talking about...

You forget to attach a sample!

Jorge Marcedo  
Coimbra | Portugal

Font Example.. I thought I had attached... ooops..

[http://www.amipromo.com/font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/www.amipromo.com/font.jpg "http://www.amipromo.com/font.jpg")

slightly customised DIN 1451 Engschrift is the closest match I could think of ...  
hope it helps

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-conduit/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-conduit/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-conduit/")

Except the “g” that look very fake to me it reminds me more Customised Conduit.
If it is Method, they customised the _r_. I’m also not 100% sure about the _s_. Is that close enough for you, Dennis?

Actually Method this was the closest I could find. The difference is in the connection to the vertical stem as in the “h” “r” and “g”.  
Could be customized or entirely separate typeface.

Here is a sample of Method regular. [schools.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121144/http:/www.ezhw.com/a/sch.gif)
I think that method would be sufficent for my needs. however I am missing where to purchase it or download it?

I think you should contact the designers directly:  
 [info@letterhead.ru](mailto:info@letterhead.ru)
